name: After The Blight
description:
Flesh monsters came from the unknown... The world called them blights and you have lost your son... Find him and bring him home.

Credits:

Art: Martizt

Art: Beoni.chan

Programming & Music: Conor McDonagh Rollo

Warning: There's very little sounds, project got rushed and you can click the settings menu at your own peril... Enjoy :)
